thread.section_title: Rebel Wilson News on her Movies and Clothing Line Torrid | Daily Mail Online
thread.title: channels Amy Winehouse on Pitch Perfect 3 set
thread.title_full: Rebel Wilson channels Amy Winehouse on Pitch Perfect 3 set | Daily Mail Online

author: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
title: channels Amy Winehouse on Pitch Perfect 3 set
text:
Rehearsals for musical comedy film Pitch Perfect 3 are in full swing.
And Rebel Wilson was spotted giving her all, while in costume on the Atlanta set on Monday.
The 36-year-old channeled the late Amy Winehouse, sporting a giant beehive, fake tattoos and heavy eye makeup, while flaunting her curves in a tartan bodice and leopard print skirt.
She's got big shoes to fill! Rebel Wilson, 36, was spotted channeling the late Amy Winehouse, while on set in Atlanta for Pitch Perfect 3 on Monday, sporting a giant beehive, fake tattoos and heavy eye makeup
Rebel emerged from her trailer in full costume.
While keeping warm in an oversized parka, the comedian highlighted her curves in a tartan bodice and leopard print knee-length skirt.
Black studded flats and an embellished belt cinching in at her waist, worked as key accessories.
Curvaceous: The comedian highlighted her curves in a tartan bodice and a leopard print knee-length skirt
Details: Black studded flats and an embellished belt cinching in at her waist, worked as key accessories
Paying homage to the late Amy Winehouse, Rebel swept her blonde tresses underneath a giant black beehive with a red ribbon, and covered her arms and chest with Amy's trademark tattoos.
A flawless complexion, heavy winged eyeliner and a small mole above her lip, finished off the beauty look.
Ready for rehearsals, Rebel carried a notepad and pen in one hand, as she made her way to a microphone stand.
Just like Amy: Rebel swept her blonde tresses underneath a giant black beehive with a red ribbon, and covered her arms and chest with Amy's trademark tattoos
In the zone: The Bridesmaids star was seen belting out a series of tracks by Amy Winehouse
The Bridesmaids star was seen belting out a series of tracks by Amy Winehouse, no doubt attempting her best impersonation as she raised her arms in the air.
Amy Winehouse tragically passed away from alcohol poisoning at age 27, in July 2011.
The Grammy Award-winning blues, soul and jazz singer-songwriter, was known for chart-topping hits including Rehab, Back to Black, Valerie and Love Is a Losing Game.
In character: Heavy winged eyeliner and a small mole above her lip, finished off the beauty look
Tragic: Amy Winehouse passed away from alcohol poisoning at age 27, in July 2011
The third installment of musical comedy film Pitch Perfect, is set to hit theatres in December this year.
Hard at work in rehearsals, Rebel has shared a series of behind-the-scenes snaps with her co-stars including Anna Kendrick, Kelley Jakle, Ester Dean and Hana Mae Lee.
The group have also been seen enjoying down-time together, dining at restaurants and watching championship football.
Notoriety: The Grammy Award-winning blues, soul and jazz singer-songwriter [pictured], was known for chart-topping hits including Rehab, Back to Black, Valerie and Love Is a Losing Game
Familiar faces: Hard at work in rehearsals, Rebel has shared a series of behind-the-scenes snaps with her co-stars including Anna Kendrick, Kelley Jakle, Ester Dean and Hana Mae Lee
